Shore Storage Manager Namespace List

Here is a list of all documented namespaces with brief descriptions:
lockingLock modes and duration type. Exported to API for use by servers to simplify the names
memory_blockPer-thread heap memory management
shore_compatA namespace for implementations of old-style streambufs
shore_errlogA namespace for errlog-related types
ssm_sortA namespace to contain certain types used for ss_m::sort_file
tls_tricksA namespace for thread-local storage tricks
two_phase_commitTypes for API used for 2PC
w_hashingA namespace to contain types related to hashing
